title: Blog
text:
Exploring how predictive models can enhance epidemiological studies and improve decision-making in healthcare.





Techniques for analyzing interval-censored data, with applications in epidemiology and public health research.





A guide to using R for spatial data visualization and analysis in public health contexts.

title: Portfolio
text:
Academic Projects

Childhood Obesity Prediction: Research in partnership with CIDACS and UFMG focused on statistical modeling.
Bias Correction: Identification and correction of gender biases in Word Embeddings.



Experiences

People Analytics - green4T: Development of interactive reports in Power BI.
ESTAT MG: Leadership and management of statistical projects with a focus on organizational growth.
